official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 87-77, to authorize transportation of passengers on foreign flag vessels between certain ports in Alaska and certain ports in the United States outside Alaska.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to marine transportation of passengers to authorize passenger transportation on foreign-flag vessels among ports in southeastern and south central Alaska, and between points in the United States outside Alaska and points in southeastern Alaska.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 87-77, to authorize transportation of passengers on foreign flag vessels between certain ports in Alaska and certain ports in the United States outside Alaska.
